description: Performance and health metrics for MSSQL Servers using windows_exporter and Prometheus

panels.description:
**DEADLOCKS**

Number of lock requests per second that resulted in a deadlock since last restart
panels.title: DEADLOCKS

panels.description:
**RUIG**

Number of duplicate tempdb recovery unit id generated.
panels.title: RUIG

panels.description:
**LOGICAL CONNECTIONS**

Number of logical connections to the system.

The main purpose of logical connections is to service multiple active result sets (MARS) requests. For MARS requests, every time that an application makes a connection to SQL Server, there may be more than one logical connection that corresponds to a physical connection.

When MARS is not used, the ratio between physical and logical connections is 1:1. Therefore, every time that an application makes a connection to SQL Server, logical connections will increase by 1.
panels.title: LOGICAL CONNECTIONS

panels.description:
**LOGINS-LOGOUTS**

Total number of logins started per second. This does not include pooled connections.

Total number of logout operations started per second.
panels.title: LOGINS-LOGOUTS

panels.description:
**SQL CPU**

Returns elapsed time that all of the threads of this process used the processor to execute instructions by mode (privileged, user).
panels.title: SQL CPU

panels.description:
**CONNECTIONS RESETS**

Total number of logins started from the connection pool.
panels.title: CONNECTIONS RESETS

panels.description:
**LOCK WAITS I/O**

SQL Trace IO Provider Lock Waits
panels.title: LOCK WAITS I/O

panels.description:
**PLE**

Indicates the number of seconds a page will stay in the buffer pool without references.
panels.title: PLE

panels.description:
**Fetch | DLC Latency**

Average latency in microseconds between log blocks entering the Direct Log Consumer and being retrieved by the XTP controller, per second.
panels.title: Fetch | DLC Latency

panels.description:
**Peak | DLC Latency**

The largest recorded latency, in microseconds, of a fetch from the Direct Log Consumer by the XTP controller.
panels.title: Peak | DLC Latency

targets.legendFormat: Log Pool Empty Free Pool Pushes/sec
Log Pool Total Shared Pool Bytes/sec

panels.description:
**Lock Timeouts**

Number of lock requests per second that timed out, but excluding requests for NOWAIT locks.
panels.title: Lock Timeouts

title: ms sql instances dashboard
